changes.title: Initial Release - Driver Zone Mapper
changes.description: Interactive map-based zone management system for drivers to track and manage their service areas

changes.title: 99 Pre-loaded Zones
changes.description: Comprehensive coverage across Portsmouth, Havant, Waterlooville, Fareham, Gosport, Hayling Island, and Chichester areas

changes.title: Real-time GPS Tracking
changes.description: Live location tracking with automatic zone detection - see which zones you're currently in

changes.title: Custom Zone Creation
changes.description: Add your own zones by clicking on the map - set custom names and radius for each zone

changes.title: Zone List Management
changes.description: View all zones in a sortable list - delete zones you no longer need with a single click

changes.title: Satellite Map View
changes.description: Toggle between satellite, dark, and light map styles for better visibility

changes.title: Zone Tooltips
changes.description: Hover over zones to see their names - easy identification on the map

changes.title: PWA Support
changes.description: Install the app on your device for offline access and native-like experience

changes.title: Local Storage
changes.description: All your custom zones are saved locally - no account needed, works offline
